sentence.text: BACKGROUND miRNA catabolic process is a gene involved in many biological processes, including development, glucose metabolism, and tumorigenesis.

The role of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II (a target gene of let-7) and the miRNA catabolic process-let-7-c-Myc pathway in the growth and malignancy of thyroid cancer is unclear.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The purpose of the present study was to evaluate the expression of miRNA catabolic processA, let-7a, and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in human papillary thyroid carcinoma (biological_process) and to investigate their potential mechanisms in the progression of PTC.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Clinically, miRNA catabolic processA was linked to a higher tumor/node/metastasis stage and the presence of lymph node metastases.

CONCLUSIONS The miRNA catabolic processA/let-7a/negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II pathway is involved in cancer growth and malignant behavior in biological_process and is a potential target for therapeutic intervention in this disease

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
